src:
Una cadete de Policía grave al chocar contra un árbol
01 Nov 2019 by Redacción Diario de Cuyo
María Belén Molina (20) quedó grave tras estrellarse en su moto 110 cc contra un árbol, cuando se dirigía a la Escuela de Policía donde se prepara para ser Oficial, cerca de las 6 de ayer. Ocurrió cuando circulaba por la Costanera, cerca de Salta, en Chimbas. La hipótesis de su familia es que se le atravesó un animal o que alguien en algún vehículo la encerró, dijeron ayer a este diario.
text:
A serious police cadet hitting a tree
01 Nov 2019 by Cuyo Daily Writing
María Belén Molina (20) was serious after crashing on her motorcycle 110 cc against a tree, when she was going to the Police School where she prepares to be an Officer, around 6 yesterday. It happened while driving along the waterfront, near Salta, in Chimbas. The hypothesis of her family is that she was crossed by an animal or that someone in a vehicle locked her up, they told this newspaper yesterday.
